meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>young</kanji> <kanji>leaf</kanji> is exactly what you'd expect, although most people usually just call them <vocabulary>fresh leaves</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for the kanji in this word are the kun'yomi readings. Since you've already seen the word 青, hopefully you can just combine it with 葉 (you learned the reading for this part with the kanji). Be sure to pay attention to the rendaku, though. は goes to ば in this word, making it <reading>あおば</reading>.
